narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Gravity Diagnostics, LLC is a Clinical Medical Laboratory provider based in Covington, KY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $116.2M in Medicaid payments across 3.8M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $116.2M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,519 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
